Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Excellence is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: History never looks like history when you are living through it

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people have greatness thrust upon them. Very few have excellence thrust upon them

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities - brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people strengthen the society just by being the kind of people they are

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever I am, or whatever I am doing, some kind of excellence is within my reach

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: For every talent that poverty has stimulated it has blighted a hundred

Quote.Author: John W. Gardner
Quote.QuoteValue: All laws are an attempt to domesticate the natural ferocity of the species

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: If everything isn't black and white, I say, 'Why the hell not?'

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Talk low, talk slow and don't say too much

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Tomorrow hopes we have learned something from yesterday

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: In westerns, you meet a hardy bunch of characters. There is no jealousy on such pictures

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: All I'm for is the liberty of the individual

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: I've loved reading all my life

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody should come to the movies unless he believes in heroes

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Get off your horse and drink your milk

Quote.Author: John Wayne
Quote.QuoteValue: My folks always let me go to the movies every Saturday. We were really motion-picture goers

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: Money will determine whether the accused goes to prison or walks out of the courtroom a free man

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in the fact that life is about preparation, preparation, preparation

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: If it doesn't fit, you must acquit

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: If it doen't make sense, you should find for the defense

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: I decided I wanted to be a lawyer when I was 11 years of age

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: Black jurors sit on juries every day and convict black people every day

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: Since the Puffy Combs case in New York, I will not try any more criminal cases

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to be judged by how we do in times of crisis

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: Jurors want courtroom lawyers to have some compassion and be nice

Quote.Author: Johnnie Cochran
Quote.QuoteValue: An opening statement is like a guide or a road map. It's a very delicate thing

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the thing to do is enjoy the ride while you're on it

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: Escapism is survival to me

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: Am I a romantic? I've seen 'Wuthering Heights' ten times. I'm a romantic

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: At my very core, I'm pretty shy. I just happen to have a weird job

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't pretend to be captain weird. I just do what I do

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a drive in me that won't allow me to do certain things that are easy

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is just very, very blurry. I've never had proper vision

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sure I'm adult yet

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: Trips to the dentist - I like to postpone that kind of thing

Quote.Author: Johnny Depp
Quote.QuoteValue: Tomorrow it'll all be over, then I'll have to go back to selling pens again

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew my beard out a little bit just to show that, indeed, I am a man

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody gets lucky all the time. Nobody can win all the time. Nobody's a robot. Nobody's perfect

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I will be 60 or 70 years old still rocking my Chanel blazer with my hair all coiffed

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime you get men in glitter, it's a flamboyant occasion!

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an ice skater. I'm all about the glitter

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to spend my life on an ice cube

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't eat as much as an athlete should. I just don't like it

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: You only live once. Life is a show

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a whole fur closet. I'm not afraid of PETA

Quote.Author: Johnny Weir
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge fur fan; it's no secret to anyone anymore

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a vintage which comes with age and experience

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: You know these love letters mix with whisky, just don't light a match when you kiss me

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd crawl over broken glass for Elle MacPherson or Cindy Crawford

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't waste your time away thinkin' 'bout yesterday's blues

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: I always think I'm the Tom Cruise of music - a lot of success and fans, but no critics, darling

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: We've been gone five years and the best they could come up with was boy bands?

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: If people have to tell you how successful they are, they really aren't that successful

Quote.Author: Jon Bon Jovi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work well outside the lines; my report card once read, 'doesn't play well with others.'

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: The best ideas start as conversations

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are truly innovating, you don't have a prototype you can refer to

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: There is beauty when something works and it works intuitively

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Design' is a word that's come to mean so much that it's also a word that has come to mean nothing

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: Designing and developing anything of consequence is incredibly challenging

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: If something is not good enough, stop doing it

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no learning without trying lots of ideas and failing lots of times

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: I am keenly aware that I benefit from a wonderful tradition in the UK of designing and making

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: I discovered at an early age that all I've ever wanted to do is design

Quote.Author: Jonathan Ive
Quote.QuoteValue: When something exceeds your ability to understand how it works, it sort of becomes magical

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: No great achiever - even those who made it seem easy - ever succeeded without hard work

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: Find people not to envy but to admire. Do not the profitable but the admirable deed. Live by ideals

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: Cyberspace can't compensate for real space. We benefit from chatting to people face to face

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: The market economy is very good at wealth creation but not perfect at all about wealth distribution

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: Parenthood involves massive sacrifice: money, attention, time and emotional energy

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to rediscover the idea of the common good and work together to build a home

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: To defend a country you need an army, but to defend a civilization you need education

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: The Holocaust survivors are among the most inspiring people I have had the privilege to meet

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: The meaning of the universe lies outside the universe

Quote.Author: Jonathan Sacks
Quote.QuoteValue: The people of Israel are entitled, as is any other nation, to live in peace and safety

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: May you live all the days of your life

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is no blessing in itself, except when it is used to protect the innocent

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Satire is a sort of glass, wherein beholders do generally discover everybody's face but their own

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: We have enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love one another

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Better belly burst than good liquor be lost

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are but wind; and learning is nothing but words; ergo, learning is nothing but wind

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: Vanity is a mark of humility rather than of pride

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman

Quote.Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote.QuoteValue: The proper words in the proper places are the true definition of style

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I see music as fluid architecture

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned a woman is never an old woman

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: There are things to confess that enrich the world, and things that need not be said

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: The God of the Old Testament is the depiction of evil

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: My heart is broken in the face of the stupidity of my species

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: My goal as a writer is more to comfort than to disturb

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got 50 different tunings in the guitar

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Sorrow is so easy to express and yet so hard to tell

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: No one likes to have less than they had before. That's the nature of the human animal

Quote.Author: Joni Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Not to dismiss Gershwin, but Gershwin is the chip; Ellington was the block

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: Life itself is a quotation

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: The original is unfaithful to the translation

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: My undertaking is not difficult, essentially. I should only have to be immortal to carry it out

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy is an abuse of statistics

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: To fall in love is to create a religion that has a fallible god

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality is not always probable, or likely

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: To die for a religion is easier than to live it absolutely

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: I have known uncertainty: a state unknown to the Greeks

Quote.Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote.QuoteValue: The Falklands thing was a fight between two bald men over a comb

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: A genuine man goes to the roots. To be a radical is no more than that: to go to the roots

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: One just principle from the depths of a cave is more powerful than an army

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: To use for our exclusive benefit what is not ours is theft

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: A selfish man is a thief

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberty is the right of every man to be honest, to think and to speak without hypocrisy

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps the enemies of liberty are such only because they judge it by its loud voice

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: It is terrible to speak of you, Liberty, for one who lives without you

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: He who uses the office he owes to the voters wrongfully and against them is a thief

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: Peoples are made of hate and of love, and more of hate than love

Quote.Author: Jose Marti
Quote.QuoteValue: We light the oven so that everyone may bake bread in it

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is a game about feelings and intelligence

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: When I go to the press conference before the game, in my mind the game has already started

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing that we cannot control is our supporters

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: Look at the way teams play against Arsenal. They don't believe they can win. They don't believe

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody can be smart

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: I am Jose Mourinho and I don't change. I arrive with all my qualities and my defects

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: Unhappy is a nice word

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to win and especially, as I have, you have to win a trophy for the first time

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: So I know all about the ups and downs of football, I know that one day I will be sacked

Quote.Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I would like is to have more control of the game in terms of possession

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading is a basic tool in the living of a good life

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Modesty is not only an ornament, but also a guard to virtue

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Their is no defense against criticism except obscurity

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing which we receive with so much reluctance as advice

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: Jesters do often prove prophets

Quote.Author: Joseph Addison
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman seldom asks advice before she has bought her wedding clothes

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Some memories are unforgettable, remaining ever vivid and heartwarming!

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: As with the butterfly, adversity is necessary to build character in people

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: You can find peace amidst the storms that threaten you

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: True love lasts forever

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: The Lord Jesus Christ is our partner, helper and advocate

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty is of God and dishonesty of the devil; the devil was a liar from the beginning

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience with family members and others who are close to us is vital for us to have happy homes

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Lucifer is a master at gradual deception

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Perseverance is a positive, active characteristic

Quote.Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote.QuoteValue: Desire, burning desire, is basic to achieving anything beyond the ordinary

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Venice is eternity itself

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: How delightful to find a friend in everyone

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Who included me among the ranks of the human race?

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is what he reads

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: A language is a more ancient and inevitable thing than any state

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Life - the way it really is - is a battle not between Bad and Good but between Bad and Worse

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: It is well to read everything of something, and something of everything

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: What I like about cities is that everything is king size, the beauty and the ugliness

Quote.Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote.QuoteValue: For a writer only one form of patriotism exists: his attitude toward language

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing more enticing, disenchanting, and enslaving than the life at sea

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: The sea has never been friendly to man. At most it has been the accomplice of human restlessness

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Going home must be like going to render an account

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Words, as is well known, are the great foes of reality

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Facing it, always facing it, that's the way to get through. Face it

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: A caricature is putting the face of a joke on the body of a truth

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Gossip is what no one claims to like, but everybody enjoys

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear

Quote.Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote.QuoteValue: All ambitions are lawful except those which climb upward on the miseries or credulities of mankind

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The aim of argument, or of discussion, should not be victory, but progress

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to debate a question without settling it than to settle a question without debating it

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: The best remedy for a short temper is a long walk

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Innocence is always unsuspicious

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Kindness is loving people more than they deserve

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Love and fear. Everything the father of a family says must inspire one or the other

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who never retract their opinions love themselves more than they love the truth

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagination is the eye of the soul

Quote.Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote.QuoteValue: Misery is almost always the result of thinking

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: One day in God's grace is equivalent to a thousand days of striving by your own efforts

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: The law condemns the best of us; but grace saves the worst of us

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Sin does not stop God's grace from flowing, but God's grace will stop sin

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of things we don't have to have, but they're enjoyable

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen with grace, with no judgment, without imposing the law

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the holy spirit, the spirit of the lord, can transform us

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot mock God because whatever good thing you do, you're gonna reap for it

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowing that you are completely forgiven destroys the power of sin in your life

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Isn't it interesting that God appears holy when he's gracious?

Quote.Author: Joseph Prince
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is God's blessing

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is the solution to all problems. No man - no problem

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is a weapon whose effects depend on who holds it in his hands and at whom it is aimed

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: The people who cast the votes don't decide an election, the people who count the votes do

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: In the Soviet army it takes more courage to retreat than advance

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot make a revolution with silk gloves

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: A sincere diplomat is like dry water or wooden iron

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: The only real power comes out of a long rifle

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone imposes his own system as far as his army can reach

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: When we hang the capitalists they will sell us the rope we use

Quote.Author: Joseph Stalin
Quote.QuoteValue: One death is a tragedy; one million is a statistic

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: There are lots of people who mistake their imagination for their memory

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some people so addicted to exaggeration that they can't tell the truth without lying

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no revenge so complete as forgiveness

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius ain't anything more than elegant common sense

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no greater evidence of superior intelligence than to be surprised at nothing

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: A good way I know to find happiness, is to not bore a hole to fit the plug

Quote.Author: Josh Billings
Quote.QuoteValue: A puppy plays with every pup he meets, but an old dog has few associates

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wanna be famous, then it's okay if the music is fake, because fame isn't real

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: Making people uncomfortable is one of my hobbies

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to move forward and notice things along the roadside that indicate where I should go

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the only thing I've ever known that doesn't have any rules at all

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: Guitar solos, to me, should be a really articulate way to make fun of guitar solos

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: I know there are some labels that put out music for art's sake, but I don't know which ones

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: I think part of what happens is that small labels want to get bigger. And bigger is not better

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: So the thing is to put out music for music's sake

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to keep my feet on the sidewalk

Quote.Author: Josh Homme
Quote.QuoteValue: You got to risk something to be able to give something, you know?

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Absolutely eat dessert first. The thing that you want to do the most, do that

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Equality is like gravity. We need it to stand on this earth as men and women

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Who is to say who is the villain and who is the hero? Probably the dictionary

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember to always be yourself

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Every vampire fiction reinvents vampires to its own needs. You take what you want

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're making a film, you have an obligation to fill the frame with life

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Those of us who write spend our entire lives in an endless English class

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very hard-line, angry atheist. Yet I am fascinated by the concept of devotion

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Horror movies don't exist unless you go and see them, and people always will

Quote.Author: Joss Whedon
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: The best proof of love is trust

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriages, like careers, need constant nurturing... the secret of having it all is loving it all

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: The world at large does not judge us by who we are and what we know; it judges us by what we have

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how love-sick a woman is, she shouldn't take the first pill that comes along

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: For men to be virgins, we think it's negative. We think that there's something wrong with them

Quote.Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening, not imitation, may be the sincerest form of flattery

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: In love there are two things - bodies and words

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: Night comes to the desert all at once, as if someone turned off the light

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: My role models were childless: Virginia Woolf, Jane Austen, George Eliot, the Brontes

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: Dust jackets are always something of an enigma to me

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider tragedy the highest form of art

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: A good, sympathetic review is always a wonderful surprise

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: Obviously the imagination is fueled by emotions beyond the control of the conscious mind

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: I probably spend 90% of my time revising what I've written

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: Boxing has become America's tragic theater

Quote.Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote.QuoteValue: Love commingled with hate is more powerful than love. Or hate
